general.gigTitle: design or develop a responsive wordpress website

sellerCard.description: I am a professional WordPress expert. I have more than 4 years of Experience  in configuring and troubleshooting WordPress. I can install, fix, move, customize WordPress sites.

description.content:
Please contact me first to Discuss the project before Ordering the gig.


Your Internet presence can have a great impact on your business. Many people turn to the Internet to find local businesses. A good website is essential to having sturdy web presence and increasing your sales.


I will work closely with you to determine your business needs and your site objectives. 


Simple


 Best for 1 page website. 

 Wordpress Theme configuration

 Social Media accounts setup.

 Theme of my choice.

 Responsive Design


Prime


 Best for 5 pages site. 

 Best for Starter Sites

 Image or Video Slider,

 Social Media accounts setup 

 Contact Form w/ Captcha.

 Theme of my choice or your choice.

 Blog Setup

 Matching color Scheme with your logo.

 Responsive Design


Ultra


 Best for upto 10 pages website.

 eCommerce Website

 Theme of my choice or your choice.

 Social Media accounts setup

 Image or Video Slider and

 Contact Form w/ Captcha

 Blog setup.

 Responsive Design

 Seo Friendly Website Design


Please read the FAQ section or send me a message.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What will you need from me after placing the gig order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You will have to provide me the access of your web cpanel, wordpress login, content in word doc format, logos and images.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer website hosting or domain?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I don't provide any hosting/domain services. You need to register it on your own to have full control over website. I can guide you to in this regard.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit/maintain/update the site content myself?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, of course. you can easily log in as site admin and make any of the changes to the content that you like. It would be as easy as typing into a word document with WYSIWYG (What-You-See-Is-What-You-Get) editor.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I have your support on project after completion of project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will provide you support for FREE for some days after completion of project. After that i can offer you a custom maintenance package to keep your website upto date.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be mobile friendly and open for all devices like tab, mobile and PCs?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Will my website be mobile friendly and open for all devices like tab, mobile and PCs?

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you have any portfolio about your website services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I have portfolio of my recent works. Please send me a message so that i can provide you the samples.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I don't have any content ready for website what should I do now ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will use dummy content for the website which you can change easily after your content ready.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you upload the website on my hosting to make it live?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. If you're buying a new WordPress website from me, migrating and launching the site is included in the price.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if there is an error or a feature that I requested is missing? Will you make revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Contact me ASAP after delivery of work. I will not accept any responsibility after weeks, months or years.

questionsAndAnswers.question: When will you deliver my order? I see that you have several orders in queue!
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Delivery of you project based on package you order. It doesn't matter how many orders are in queue.

packageList.title: Simple Package

reviews.comment: Joshuwa, is a professional as you will find, here or anywhere. I highly recommend him for any of his thorough services. You will not be disappointed!
Josh has the capabilities to turn your imagination into reality. he's truly exceptional and he will always be my go to for website development!
Great work as always, Joshuwa! Thanks for the speedy website work and attention to detail on this project - it looks perfect - no revisions needed!

I cannot overstate my gratitude and appreciation for Joshuwash. This is probably the 5th or 6th time I've had the pleasure to work with him. His quality of work, willingness to go "above and beyond", ease of communication, and attention to detail are truly over the top. I HIGHLY recommend his services...He will always be my "go-to guy" as it pertains to handling any and all of my website needs. If you're looking for someone you can trust with your website needs...you've found him.
Josh is always good to me!!! He knocked out two websites!!!

notableClients.name: Global Excel Summit
notableClients.interaction_description:
Worked on this website several times, which includes Fixing the Mobile version and website migration.

Global Excel Summit is worlds largest virtual gathering of Microsoft Excel users, pros and industry experts.

enriched_details.name: Global Excel Summit
enriched_details.description: Welcome to the worlds largest virtual gathering of Microsoft Excel users, pros and industry experts. The Global Excel Summit is the leading, CPD-accredited virtual conference, supporting the growth and development of the Excel industry globally.
